scene.title: 一撃に返す•壱

mono.p: [Live well.]
The voice echoed in Li Sushang's Mind Lake.
The lake was calm as usual, everything around was Still Water.
[Make sure you live well.]
The voice reverberated within the Mind Lake.
A soft breeze caressed the body, everything was Dustless.
[Promise me…]
The sound… reverberates.
The Mind Lake is like a Clear Mirror, illuminating all of heaven and earth.
Why did Blade Sanction fail? No more doubts. [\s]
Why did Blade Sanction fail? No more regrets. [\s]
Why did Blade Sanction fail? No more worries.
Throw away all the troubles, just concentrate on this strike. [\s]
Use the sword— the tool for killing,[\s]
With sword techniques— the skills of killing.
Kill the enemy and live.
Sushang's thoughts are nothing more than that.
How ironic, the purpose was so simple. [\s]
Yet she detoured a long, long way.
Holding the hilt with her fingers, she felt relieved.
This ancient sword Xuanyuan was her only support at the moment.
Wiping off the blood from the corner of her eye and wiping off the foam from her mouth.
The girl held a sword in her hand.
She didn’t rake up any sword stances yet, but,
Opening, Switch, Guard, Wrath.
Sailing Eagle, Soaring Falcon, [\s]Raining Swift, Sparrow’s Roost, [\s]Shadow Hawk, Selene’s Heron. [\s]
Gaunt Willow, Gentle Orchid, Girded Bamboo, [\s]Gray Chrysanthemum, Gleaming Lotus, Green Pines.[\s]
Ripstone, Roaring Thunder, Railing Blitz, Rockslide, Riven Dust, Roiling Gale.
These are the four forms and twenty-one stances of Taixuan’s Blade Form. Their names flashed across her mind as the muscle memories of each form passed through her body.

scene.text: Although the enemy was close, the sound seems to be coming from far, far away.
scene.dialog: “I will only use one trick: Wrath Form • Rockslide.”
"There is only one move: Wrath Form • Rockslide. I won't keep my hand, let me see your response."

text.p: Ma Feima's instructions slipped through Sushang's mind, and she didn't care.

scene.text: After all, everything comes down to this one strike.
